subject: College Athletics
Deportation
lead_paragraph: The athletic director of a prep school said the N.C.A.A. investigation of Baylor University includes its recruitment of one of the best 25 high school juniors in the country.
snippet: The athletic director of a prep school said the N.C.A.A. investigation of Baylor University includes its recruitment of one of the best 25 high school juniors in the country.
